directions: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium-low heat. Cook asparagus in melted butter, stirring a few times, until tender, 6 to 8 minutes.
Drizzle honey over the asparagus and stir to coat; season with garlic powder and cayenne pepper.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, or more as needed
title: Easiest Asparagus
